name: tx-tools_lookup-code
description:
Look up a clinical code based on text description using a FHIR terminology server. Use this when 
  populating coded fields within FHIR resources to ensure that the code is valid and compliant with 
  the value set binding of the element. Returns the most relevant coding from the value set.

filter.description:
Text to search for (e.g. "hypertension", "tracheotomy", "left quad 
    laceration")

url.description:
ValueSet URL to search within.
    Common values:
    - "http://snomed.info/sct?fhir_vs" (all of SNOMED CT, use this if not specified)
    - "http://loinc.org/vs" (all of LOINC)
    - "http://snomed.info/sct?fhir_vs=isa/71388002" (SNOMED CT procedures, i.e. all codes that are a 
      subtype of Procedure (71388002))

name: au-fhir-tools_generate-hpi-i
description: Generate a fictional but valid HPI-I.

name: au-fhir-tools_generate-ihi
description: Generate a fictional but valid Individual Healthcare Identifier (IHI).

name: au-fhir-tools_generate-medicare
description: Generate a fictional but valid Medicare number.

name: au-fhir-tools_generate-dva
description: Generate a fictional but valid DVA (Department of Veterans' Affairs) number.

name: au-fhir-tools_generate-hpi-o
description: Generate a fictional but valid HPI-O (Healthcare Provider Identifier - Organisation).
